column5: This is just aweful... breaking the law and putting it on film and then the film gets put on the news... http://www.justnews.com/video/21212068/index.html ( FYI all sharks caught and kept must be caught with hook and line.. not   a gaff

Un-freakin'-believable.....  I feel so much better knowing the meat was given away to friends....  If it's against the law to do what they did, they'll all be busted like the Sturgeon guy a month back. Hard to believe they're bragging about it on TV if it's illegal.
That's just unbelievable Jamie!!!  How can they get away with that without anybody thinking its not right?  I hope they get caught and fined like they should be.  Joey

Complete Bull!!!... they had to have hit it with a 12 gauge power point or just shot it... no way you're just going to gaff a 748 lb. Mako and land it!!!... get real!!!  Video is too chopped up to be believeable!!!... I guess an idiot might believe it!

Wouldn't it be self defense? Since they are clearly trying to make the claim the fish was attacking the boat....  Although, if your baiting a fish that eats humans I don't see how you can claim self defense....
